name: List branches

params.name: protected
params.description: Setting to `true` returns only protected branches.

name: Get branch
Get branch protection
Update branch protection
description: Protecting a branch requires admin or owner permissions to the repository.

params.name: required_status_checks
params.description: Require status checks to pass before merging. Set to `null` to disable.

params.name: enforce_admins
params.description: Enforce all configured restrictions for administrators. Set to `true` to enforce required status checks for repository administrators. Set to `null` to disable.

params.name: required_pull_request_reviews
params.description: Require at least one approving review on a pull request, before merging. Set to `null` to disable.

params.name: restrictions
params.description: Restrict who can push to this branch. Team and user `restrictions` are only available for organization-owned repositories. Set to `null` to disable.

params.name: strict
params.description: Require branches to be up to date before merging.

params.name: contexts
params.description: The list of status checks to require in order to merge into this branch

params.name: dismissal_restrictions
params.description: Specify which users and teams can dismiss pull request reviews. Pass an empty `dismissal_restrictions` object to disable. User and team `dismissal_restrictions` are only available for organization-owned repositories. Omit this parameter for personal repositories.

params.name: dismiss_stale_reviews
params.description: Dismiss approved reviews automatically when a new commit is pushed.

params.name: require_code_owner_reviews
params.description: Blocks merge until code owners have reviewed.

params.name: users
params.description: The list of user `login`s with dismissal access

params.name: teams
params.description: The list of team `slug`s with dismissal access

params.name: users
params.description: The list of user `login`s with push access

params.name: teams
params.description: The list of team `slug`s with push access

name: Remove branch protection
Get required status checks of protected branch
Update required status checks of protected branch
description: Updating required status checks requires admin or owner permissions to the repository and branch protection to be enabled.

params.name: strict
params.description: Require branches to be up to date before merging.

params.name: contexts
params.description: The list of status checks to require in order to merge into this branch

name: Remove required status checks of protected branch

Update pull request review enforcement of protected branch
description: Updating pull request review enforcement requires admin or owner permissions to the repository and branch protection to be enabled.

params.name: dismissal_restrictions
params.description: Specify which users and teams can dismiss pull request reviews. User and team `dismissal_restrictions` are only available for organization-owned repositories. Omit this parameter for personal repositories.

params.name: dismiss_stale_reviews
params.description: Dismiss approved reviews automatically when a new commit is pushed.

params.name: require_code_owner_reviews
params.description: Blocks merge until code owners have reviewed.

params.name: users
params.description: The list of user `login`s with dismissal access

params.name: teams
params.description: The list of team `slug`s with dismissal access

name: Remove pull request review enforcement of protected branch
Get required signatures of protected branch
description:
When authenticated with admin or owner permissions to the repository, you can use this endpoint to check whether a branch requires signed commits. An enabled status of `true` indicates you must sign commits on this branch. For more information, see [Signing commits with GPG](https://help.github.com/articles/signing-commits-with-gpg) in GitHub Help.

**Note**: You must enable branch protection to require signed commits.

name: Add required signatures of protected branch
description: When authenticated with admin or owner permissions to the repository, you can use this endpoint to require signed commits on a branch. You must enable branch protection to require signed commits.

name: Remove required signatures of protected branch
description: When authenticated with admin or owner permissions to the repository, you can use this endpoint to disable required signed commits on a branch. You must enable branch protection to require signed commits.

name: Get admin enforcement of protected branch
Add admin enforcement of protected branch
description: Adding admin enforcement requires admin or owner permissions to the repository and branch protection to be enabled.

name: Remove admin enforcement of protected branch
description: Removing admin enforcement requires admin or owner permissions to the repository and branch protection to be enabled.
